General.Name: Zhejiang Chunhui Intelligent Control Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Zhejiang Chunhui Intelligent Control Co., Ltd. develops, manufactures, and sells fluid control valve and control systems in China and internationally. The company offers oil and gas control products, such as dual-flow solenoid valves, electromagnetic proportional valves, oil and gas recovery components, etc., for use in gasoline and diesel tankers; gas control products; heating control products; and air conditioning control products comprising thermal expansion valves, electromagnetic thermal expansion valves, and electronic expansion valves, which are used in automotive air-conditioning systems and new energy vehicle thermal management systems. It also provides internal combustion engine accessories, including camshafts and steel tappets; and information system integration and technical services consist of gas pressure regulator early warning system, sacrificial anode tube ground potential detection systems, other software systems, etc. for gas transmission and distribution systems. Zhejiang Chunhui Intelligent Control Co., Ltd. was formerly known as Shaoxing Chunhui Refrigeration Equipment Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Zhejiang Chunhui Intelligent Control Co., Ltd. in November 2001. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Shaoxing, China. Zhejiang Chunhui Intelligent Control Co., Ltd. operates as a subsidiary of Zhejiang Chunhui Group Co.,Ltd.
General.Address: No. 288 Chunhui industrial road, Shangyu, China, 312300
